For any of these skill feats, you can select a variable skill feat, such as {@feat Automatic Knowledge} or {@feat Assurance}, as long as you do so for an associated skill.

entries.name: Branch Influence
entries: At 5th level in a branch, you gain greater influence, making it easier to collaborate, hoodwink, or browbeat members of that branch. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on {@skill Deception}, {@skill Diplomacy}, {@skill Intimidation}, and {@skill Performance} checks to interact with members of the branch.
At 13th level, this increases to a +2 circumstance bonus, and at 17th level, it increases again to a +3 circumstance bonus.

entries.name: Skill Increase
entries: At 6th level in a branch, and every 4 levels thereafter, your studies lead you to deeper understanding of your branch's associated skills, causing you to gain an additional skill increase that you can use to raise one of the branch's associated skills, up to a maximum of expert.

At 10th branch level or higher, you can use these skill increases to become a master in a skill in which you're already an expert. At 18th level, you can use this skill increase to become legendary in a skill in which you're already a master. For Uzunjati, who have {@skill Lore} as an associated skill, you gain the {@feat Additional Lore} feat when you choose to improve Lore, instead of gaining a single skill increase to a Lore.

entries.name: Branch Feat
entries: At 7th level in a branch, you become so immersed in your branch's secrets that you gain access to special training only offered to other members of your branch. You gain the 6th-level Magaambyan attendant archetype feat requiring affiliation with your branch (such as {@feat Uzunjati Storytelling|LOCG} for the Uzunjati). You must still meet any skill prerequisites the feat has. If you already have that feat, you gain an additional 6th-level class feat (even if your branch's feat was not a class feat).

At 12th level, you also gain the 10th-level Magaambyan attendant archetype feat requiring affiliation with the branch (such as {@feat Tempest-Sun Shielding|LOCG} for the Tempest-Sun Mages). If you already have that feat, you gain an additional 10th-level class feat (even if your branch's feat was not a class feat).

entries.name: General Feat
entries: At 8th level in a branch, your understanding of your branch's traditions improves your general capabilities, stretching beyond your studies in specific skills. You gain the general feat associated with the branch. If you already have that general feat, you gain a 1st-level general feat of your choice instead.

entries.name: Make Your Own Luck
entries: At 16th level in a branch, you're so accomplished with your branch's associated skills that you make your own luck. Once per day, you can reroll a skill check with one of those skills and take the new result. This is a {@trait fortune} effect.

entries.name: Magical Paragon
entries: At 20th level in a branch, you embody the branch so completely that you gain a unique special ability depending on your branch. Many of these abilities build upon Magaambyan attendant archetype feats you have gained.

items.name: Cascade Bearers
entries: Nothing is beyond your imagination. Once per day, you can cast any common 7th-level spell from the {@filter arcane|spells||Level=7|Rarity=Common|Tradition & Spell List=arcane}, {@filter divine|spells||Level=7|Rarity=Common|Tradition & Spell List=divine}, {@filter occult|spells||Level=7|Rarity=Common|Tradition & Spell List=occult}, or {@filter primal|spells||Level=7|Rarity=Common|Tradition & Spell List=primal} spell lists without expending a spell slot. When you do, you use your spellcasting proficiency for your halcyon spells.

items.name: Emerald Boughs
entries: You can stretch your hideaway well beyond the original intended usage, creating a special extradimensional abode in which to rest with your allies, host visiting diplomats, and more. At any time, you can spend 1 minute to enter and expand your hideaway into a {@spell magnificent mansion}; it remains in this form until you leave, at which point it expels all remaining guests and becomes a normal hideaway as {@feat Emerald Boughs Hideaway|LOCG} until you spend another minute to enter and expand your hideaway again.

items.name: Rain-Scribes
entries: You can adapt to almost any situation. You can survive in severe and extreme cold and heat without taking damage. You move at full Speed through difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain, and take no damage from hazardous terrain. When using {@feat Rain-Scribe Mobility|LOCG}, you clear the effects of all three types of terrain from the spaces you enter for 1 round.

items.name: Tempest-Sun Mages
entries: You have the courage and magic to protect all your allies from harm. When you use {@feat Tempest-Sun Shielding|LOCG}, you can choose to reduce the triggering damage to you and all allies within 30 feet by four times the spell level, rather than reducing the triggering damage to you or a single ally by four times the spell level.

items.name: Uzunjati
entries: You know a surprising number of stories, and you weave them all together into a coherent narrative. When you use {@feat Uzunjati Recollection|LOCG}, you {@action Recall Knowledge} three time instead of once, each with a +2 circumstance bonus. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your skill check for {@feat Uzunjati Storytelling|LOCG} from the captivating combined narrative.
